mapper.select: select ac.*, u.user_name as author, u.head_img as authorAvatar, a.title as articleTitle, pac.content as parentComment from article_comment ac left join `user` u on ac.create_user_id = u.id left join article a on ac.article_id = a.id left join article_comment pac on ac.parent_id = pac.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select ac.*, u.user_name as author, u.head_img as authorAvatar from article_comment ac left join `user` u on ac.create_user_id = u.id where ac.`parent_id`=#{commentId}

select ac.*, u.user_name as author, u.head_img as authorAvatar , (CASE WHEN ac.create_user_id != 1 THEN 1 ELSE 999 END) as sort_user from article_comment ac left join `user` u on ac.create_user_id = u.id where ac.article_id = #{articleId} and ac.parent_id = 0 and (ac.status = 'public' or ac.create_user_id = #{userId} ) order by ac.up_count desc, ac.sort_num desc, sort_user desc, ac.created desc
